mapper.insert: insert into tb_users (user_id, user_name, user_password, user_telephone, user_role, user_token, user_state, head_image, create_time, update_time, online_state) values (#{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userPassword,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userTelephone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userRole,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userToken,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userState,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{headImage,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=DATE}, #{onlineState,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update tb_users set user_name = #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_password = #{userPassword,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_telephone = #{userTelephone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_role = #{userRole,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_token = #{userToken,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_state = #{userState,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, head_image = #{headImage,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=DATE}, online_state = #{onlineState,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select user_id, user_name, user_password, user_telephone, user_role, user_token, user_state, head_image, create_time, update_time, online_state from tb_users where user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select user_id, user_name, user_password, user_telephone, user_role, user_token, user_state, head_image, create_time, update_time, online_state from tb_users

select user_id, user_name, user_password, user_telephone, user_role, user_token, user_state, head_image, create_time, update_time, online_state from tb_users where user_telephone = #{telephone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
